head: Our expertise in materials and technologies
desc: As a family business, we rely on in-depth knowledge and years of experience in the selection and application of materials and technologies. We always choose the right material for your project. With a precise eye for detail, we also offer solutions for sophisticated moulding techniques and injection methods in order to find the optimum method for every requirement.

services.title: Materials
services.text1: Depending on your requirements, we use the ideal materials for your projects and rely on high-quality products from Meusburger:

text.test: Aluminium - For prototypes and smaller production quantities

services.title: Undercuts
services.text1: Specialised techniques for sophisticated geometries and component structures:

text.test: Mechanical sliders - cost-efficient solution for simpler moulded parts
Hydraulic slides - For more complex moulded parts with precisely controllable sliding movements

services.title: Injection methods
services.text1: The optimum injection method for different quantities and requirements. For precise and efficient material feed, we rely on the high-quality solutions from Thermoplay for hot runner systems.
